data.name: Hardenville
data.detailed_description:
About

A 20-year-old guy studying at the Hardenville University named Jack (or custom name), suddenly has important decisions ahead of him. This Visual Novel includes beautiful girls, nudity, drama, romance, moral choices and sex.

Discord

Please join our brand new community on Discord!
https://discord.com/invite/XPmezdYHeX

Includes

    • Male-female
    • Female-female

Info about Early Access

Early Access starts with a short intro, The Prologue. And then the planned, upcoming Episodes 1 to 9 will have about 1000 images and 25 animations each Episode. Which means it will have a lot more content than The Prologue.

General info

    • Images are rendered in 4k
    • Animations / videos are rendered in 1080p with an upscaling to 4k
    • Made with Daz Studio and Ren'Py

data.short_description: A 20-year-old guy studying at the Hardenville University, suddenly has important decisions ahead of him. This adult Visual Novel includes beautiful girls, nudity, drama, romance, moral choices and sex.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Catalina
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 617
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Apple M1
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04+ or Kernel 3.x+ based distributions
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 compatible
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64 bit

content_descriptors.notes: Hardenville contains mature language, sex and nudity. It also includes adult themes, and is intended for adults 18 years and older. The story, events and all characters are purely fictional and over the age of 18.
